# Saetta Saves the Queen

| runtime        =
| country        = Italy
| language       =
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
Saetta Saves the Queen () is a 1920 Italian silent adventure film directed by Ettore Ridoni and starring Domenico Gambino.
Cast
* Domenico Gambino as Saetta
* Raffaele di Napoli
* Guido Pistono
* Tina Ronay
* Lina Spina
* Luigi Stinchi
References
Bibliography
* Jacqueline Reich. The Maciste Films of Italian Silent Cinema. Indiana University Press, 2015.
External links
*
